TopicTitle: Funkyndustry | SU-27 - Meet the cobra! | Homage to EADS ZEHST (SSTO, HTOL)

Articles.Content:
Last 0.90 crafts I made (they will be updated):

**SUKHOI SU-27 Replica**

Inspired by this video

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/yVlmoNtcyhY?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
 I've tried to build a replica of the precursor of the SU-35 - the SU-27. The goal was to perform the world famous cobra maneuver... though I only can perform it completely above 10km...

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/AQUPh)

Mods:

B9 (intakes, Turbojets, Aerobrake)

B9 proc.Wings

BahaSP Adj. Langing Gears

Procedural Tanks

RemoteTech (Communotron 32)

MFT

FAR

Use fuel load for balancing (more or less stability/maneuverability)

Because the offset of some parts isn't saved correctly, I've made a video:

****

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/CGBp6ImUVtg?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

[**craft file here**](http://kerbalx.com/Funk/Sukhoi-SU-27)

[**Direct download Sukhoi SU-27**](http://kerbalx.com/Funk/Sukhoi-SU-27.craft)

**EADS ZEHST alike crew bus SSTO/HTOL**: *"THELONIOUS"*

A few years ago EADS showed their plans for hypersonic passenger transport in the future:

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/8h1PE7StoDE?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

I've made a similar SSTO which should be capable to reach kerbins moons and the suns SOI (refueled in orbit all planets) and return to Kerbin using a steep reentry trajetory.

Use less fuel load for easier takeoff. As it is, it will gain height, when leaving runway (throttle up before toggling brakes).

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/zjUDS)

Mods:

B9

B9 proc. Wings

BahaSP Adj. Landing Gears

MFT

FAR/DRE

[**craft file here**](http://kerbalx.com/Funk/FunkyndustryThelonious)

[**Direct download FunkyndustryThelonious**](http://kerbalx.com/Funk/FunkyndustryThelonious.craft)
